Detailed Description

Isomorphic calibration.

You need this calibration when your logical coordination system is flat, and orthogonal to camera axis.

void iview::CScaleCalibration::GetLogToViewTransform ( i2d::CAffine2d &  result) const

Get global transformation from logical into view units representing this calibration.

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

double iview::CScaleCalibration::GetScaleFactor ( ) const [inline]

Get scale factor.

This scale factor is multiplier used to calculate view position from logical position.
